ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gimme a break, it s not that useful.  That s what your L26 song does. It s a different way of doing it ;)  And it s fun ;)  Besides.  What else are we
ygData.messageBody:
> I used to use it a LOT on test to get things off the evac'er.
> I figure I died about 50% of the time but at least the party got out.

Gimme a break, it's not that useful. That's what your L26 song does.

It's a different way of doing it ;) And it's fun ;) Besides. What else
are we going to use it for :)

Dirge = cute and useless, nuff said, thx.

Sure it's useless but you can use it ;)

You remind me a lot of myself when I started posting here.
Have to prove everyone wrong. Have to be all-knowing. Except,
Shada, I always am all-knowing with her. I mean how smart can
a female woodelf be? /chuckle

Oh give me a break Harm. You disagree with me, that's all. I wasn't being
all knowing. I was merely posting my opinion on the topic. Last time I
checked I lived in a free country.

Plus, anyone who cannot make their point without capitalizing a
word in every sentance REALLY is irritating because it LOOKS like
you are SHOUTING at someone because you are ANGRY. It's the equivalent
of debating with someone over a topic and then resorting to voice
escalation to flood your point across. The best debates I receive
come from: jhenders@... and kim@.... They use
proper grammar, they can spell, and they never ever raise their
voice (so to speak) in the emails. Sometimes, I wish I could have
the composure they do.

Proper Nettiquette: Using allcaps in a sentence is Shouting. Using allcaps
on 1 word is used to emphasize that word. It's been that way on the
internet since before there was HTML or email clients capable of RTF format.
Therefore, since those of us who were around back then learned to talk
without bold, italics, underline etc, we used allcaps (on 1 word in a
sentence) to emphasize the importance of that word. It's not shouting.

Need to break out my procmail filters again, and run my eqbards mail
through a program that to_lowers everything /sigh =(

Oh give me a break. 1 word and you are getting upset over an issue. The
reason you're upset, frankly, is that someone disagreed with you and has
actually found a use for the song. I'm not saying it's the only way to use
the song. Nor am I saying its the best option.

And no, I don't have to prove everyone wrong. Just those who post their
opinions as if they were the only one possible.
